The GitHub repositories linked below are assignments that help students learn programming in R, while guiding them to replicate figures and tables in ["Defensive Investments and the Demand for Air Quality: Evidence from the NOx Budget Program" by Deschenes et al. (2017)](https://www.aeaweb.org/articles?id=10.1257/aer.20131002) simultaneously.

The GitHub repository for each assignment has been set as a template repository.

1.  [Understanding the Data](https://github.com/ruangmas/rep-asn-1)

2.  [Make Figure 1](https://github.com/ruangmas/rep-asn-2)

3.  [Make Table 1](https://github.com/ruangmas/rep-asn-3)

4.  [Make Appendix Figure 2A](https://github.com/ruangmas/rep-asn-4)

5.  [Make Table 2](https://github.com/ruangmas/rep-asn-5)
